member.summary: Event arguments for assembly resolution events

member.name: T:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext
member.summary: Shared Context Load Context for true unloading while maintaining shared visibility Uses proper dependency resolution to share assemblies across contexts

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.ContextId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this load context (usually the nugget/plugin ID).

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.SourcePath
member.summary: Original source path (directory or dll) used for loading.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.LoadedAt
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the context was created.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.IsSharedContext
member.summary: Flag indicating this context participates in shared resolution policy.

member.name: E:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.AssemblyResolved
member.summary: Raised when an assembly is successfully resolved by this context.

member.summary: Creates a new collectible load context for shared plugin loading.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.OnResolving(System.Runtime.Loader.AssemblyLoadContext,System.Reflection.AssemblyName)
member.summary: Handles the Resolving event for cross-plugin assembly sharing. This allows plugins to use assemblies loaded by other plugins. Fires BEFORE the Load() override is called.

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.FindMainDllWithDepsJson(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the main DLL file in a directory that has a corresponding .deps.json file

member.name: M:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextLoadContext.Load(System.Reflection.AssemblyName)
member.summary:
Official Microsoft plugin pattern from: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tutorials/creating-app-with-plugin-support
Uses AssemblyDependencyResolver to resolve plugin dependencies from .deps.json Returns null to allow default context to provide shared assemblies

member.summary: Tries to load assembly from probing paths (plugin folder, bin, runtime folders)

member.summary: Tries to load assembly from NuGet package cache

member.summary: Determines if an assembly is a system assembly

member.name: T:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextManager
member.summary: Advanced SharedContextManager that uses collectible AssemblyLoadContext for true isolation and unloading while maintaining maximum visibility between all loaded assemblies, nuggets, DLLs, and plugins ALSO stores all discovered items (drivers, data sources, etc.) for shared access

member.name: E:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextManager.NuggetLoaded
member.summary: Raised after a nugget (assembly set) is loaded into the shared context.

member.name: E:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextManager.NuggetUnloaded
member.summary: Raised after a nugget is unloaded from the shared context.

member.name: E:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextManager.PluginLoaded
member.summary: Raised when a plugin (type with plugin traits) has been registered as loaded.

member.name: E:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.PluginSystem.SharedContextManager.PluginUnloaded
member.summary: Raised when a plugin is unloaded or removed.

member.summary: Central plugin message bus for inter-plugin communication.
